answers.answer: The amniocentesis? I haven't but my sister did, she said it wasn't very pleasant
Why are you having an early delivery? Are you having complications ?
Yes that shot, iam 35+5 yes iam having a few coplications with myself and baby,
*Im having an early delivery due to my sugars gestational diabetes and baby had kidney problems heart problems and fluid in his tummy, iam also 2 centimeters dialated.
I know somebody who got that and lost the baby.... I honestly wouldn't. If its not life threatening, I would just wait a week and have the baby at 37 weeks.

My mom had it with my sister. She said it burns, stings and is very uncomfortable. It does cause miscarriage in early pregnancy, they really only do it if necessary or requested during genetic screening. Seeing as you are in the third trimester I wouldn't worry about a miscarriage. I would just think of a happy place during the amio and think of meeting your baby.

question: Have any of you ever gotten that shot in your belly to take fluid out? To see if your baby is mature enough for early delivery? Does it hurt? They are planning on doing it to me and im nervous!
title: shots
